entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
